name: Curve GUSD Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Gemini USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by the US exchange, Gemini.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Gemini USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by the US exchange, Gemini.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Gemini USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by the US exchange, Gemini.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y Gemini USD, una moneda estable regulada emitida por el intercambio de EE. UU., Gemini.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Gemini USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by the US exchange, Gemini.

This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Gemini USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by the US exchange, Gemini.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu meta havuz, 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve ABD borsası Gemini tarafından çıkarılan düzenlenmiş bir sabit para olan Gemini USD'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Gemini USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by the US exchange, Gemini.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和由交易所 Gemini 发行的受监管的美元稳定币 Gemini USD。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस मेटापूल में 3Crv (DAI, USDC, और USDT) और Gemini USD शामिल हैं, जो US एक्सचेंज, जेमिनी द्वारा जारी एक विनियमित स्थिर मुद्रा है।
